dct_title_s: Tourist map : Kriti = Κρήτη = Crete = Crète = Kreta. (Recto)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights. Map shows political and administrative divisions. Ancillary map: "Nísos Gándos." "With the compliments of Avis - we rent cars." Includes illustration of costumes of Crete. Map shows some information pictorially: Byzantine monasteries, airports, rearing sites of wild goats.
